snippet: The Royal Ballet’s program last week included very different works from three unconnected segments of society: “Birthday Offering,” “Les Noces” and “A Month in the Country.”
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews performance by the Royal Ballet at Covent Garden in London.
lead_paragraph: The Royal Ballet’s program last week included very different works from three unconnected segments of society: “Birthday Offering,” “Les Noces” and “A Month in the Country.”

headline.seo: ‘Birthday Offering’ and ‘Les Noces’ at Royal Ballet, London
headline.main: Shared by All: Love and Family, Birthdays and Weddings
headline.print_headline: Shared by All: Love and Family, Birthdays and Weddings
